context_blocks.name: What VIB3+ Is
context_blocks.content:
# What VIB3+ Is

VIB3+ is a **shader-based visualization engine** for web pages. It creates animated backgrounds using WebGL shaders.

## It Creates
- Landing page animated backgrounds
- Portfolio site effects
- Music visualizers (audio-reactive)
- Interactive art

## It Does NOT Create
- Wireframe 3D geometry
- Literal 4D polytope renders
- The names (hypercube, tesseract) describe shader patterns, not actual geometry

## Four Systems
| Key | System | Use For |
|-----|--------|---------|
| 1 | Faceted | Clean geometric patterns |
| 2 | Quantum | Flowing lattice effects |
| 3 | Holographic | Audio-reactive shimmers |
| 4 | Polychora | 4D math art (less stable) |

**For production: Use faceted, quantum, or holographic.** Polychora exists but may be unstable.

## Live Demo
https://domusgpt.github.io/vib3-plus-engine/

context_blocks.name: Geometry System
context_blocks.content:
# VIB3+ Geometry System

## 24 Geometries Per System

Formula: `geometry = coreIndex * 8 + baseIndex`

### Base Geometries (0-7)
| Index | Name | Shortcut |
|-------|------|----------|
| 0 | Tetrahedron | Alt+Q |
| 1 | Hypercube | Alt+W |
| 2 | Sphere | Alt+E |
| 3 | Torus | Alt+R |
| 4 | Klein Bottle | Alt+A |
| 5 | Fractal | Alt+S |
| 6 | Wave | Alt+D |
| 7 | Crystal | Alt+F |

### Core Variations
| Core | Multiply By | Effect | Shortcut |
|------|-------------|--------|----------|
| Base | 0 | Original (0-7) | Alt+1 |
| Hypersphere | 8 | 4D sphere warp (8-15) | Alt+2 |
| Hypertetra | 16 | 4D tetra warp (16-23) | Alt+3 |

### Examples
- Geometry 3 = Base Torus (0×8 + 3)
- Geometry 11 = Hypersphere Torus (1×8 + 3)
- Geometry 19 = Hypertetra Torus (2×8 + 3)

### API
```javascript
window.selectGeometry(11);  // Hypersphere Torus
```

context_blocks.name: JavaScript API
context_blocks.content:
# VIB3+ JavaScript API

All functions are on `window.*`:

## Core Functions
```javascript
// Switch system
window.switchSystem('holographic')  // 'faceted', 'quantum', 'holographic', 'polychora'

// Select geometry (0-23)
window.selectGeometry(11)

// Update parameter
window.updateParameter('hue', 280)
window.updateParameter('speed', 1.5)
window.updateParameter('rot4dXW', 3.14)

// Randomize / Reset
window.randomizeAll()
window.resetAll()
```

## Parameters
| Parameter | Range | Default |
|-----------|-------|--------|
| hue | 0-360 | 200 |
| saturation | 0-1 | 0.8 |
| intensity | 0-1 | 0.5 |
| gridDensity | 5-100 | 15 |
| morphFactor | 0-2 | 1.0 |
| chaos | 0-1 | 0.2 |
| speed | 0.1-3 | 1.0 |
| rot4dXY/XZ/YZ/XW/YW/ZW | -6.28 to 6.28 | 0 |

## Toggles
```javascript
window.toggleAudio()           // Audio reactivity
window.toggleDeviceTilt()      // 4D device rotation
window.toggleInteractivity()   // Mouse interaction
```

## Gallery
```javascript
window.saveToGallery()
window.openGallery()
```

context_blocks.name: Keyboard Shortcuts
context_blocks.content:
# VIB3+ Keyboard Shortcuts

## System & Geometry
| Key | Action |
|-----|--------|
| 1-4 | Switch systems |
| Alt+1-3 | Select core (Base, Hypersphere, Hypertetra) |
| Alt+Q/W/E/R | Base geometries 0-3 |
| Alt+A/S/D/F | Base geometries 4-7 |
| ←/→ | Navigate geometries |
| ↑/↓ | Cycle systems |

## Actions
| Key | Action |
|-----|--------|
| H | Show help modal |
| Ctrl+R | Randomize |
| Ctrl+Shift+Z | Reset all |
| Ctrl+Z / Ctrl+Y | Undo / Redo |

## Save & Share
| Key | Action |
|-----|--------|
| Ctrl+S | Save to gallery |
| Ctrl+G | Open gallery |
| Ctrl+L | Copy shareable URL |

## Toggles
| Key | Action |
|-----|--------|
| A | Audio reactivity |
| T | Device tilt |
| I | Interactivity menu |
| F | Fullscreen |
| P | Performance stats |

## UI
| Key | Action |
|-----|--------|
| Space / Ctrl+B | Toggle bottom panel |
| Ctrl+1-5 | Switch tabs |

context_blocks.content:
# VIB3+ Parameters Reference

## 6D Rotation (radians)
All range from -6.28 to 6.28 (≈ -2π to 2π)

| Parameter | Planes |
|-----------|--------|
| rot4dXY | X-Y rotation |
| rot4dXZ | X-Z rotation |
| rot4dYZ | Y-Z rotation |
| rot4dXW | X-W hyperspace |
| rot4dYW | Y-W hyperspace |
| rot4dZW | Z-W hyperspace |

## Visual
| Parameter | Range | Default | Effect |
|-----------|-------|---------|--------|
| gridDensity | 5-100 | 15 | Pattern detail |
| morphFactor | 0-2 | 1.0 | Shape blending |
| chaos | 0-1 | 0.2 | Organic randomness |
| speed | 0.1-3 | 1.0 | Animation rate |

## Color
| Parameter | Range | Default | Effect |
|-----------|-------|---------|--------|
| hue | 0-360 | 200 | Base color (degrees) |
| saturation | 0-1 | 0.8 | Color richness |
| intensity | 0-1 | 0.5 | Brightness |

## Usage
```javascript
window.updateParameter('paramName', value);
```
